data.what_is: Indition CRA is a marketing automation solution with social posts, email templetes and text widgets features.
data.product_description: Indition CRA is a marketing automation solution with social posts, email templetes and text widgets features.

initial_reviews.review_title: Best for Startup and mid range company to organise all efforts
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Indition CRA?
No matter you are using social or other digital activity, this will give you smooth passage to aggregate all of your activities in a single platform, as you want to target your niche or set a campaign for you or your business. So it best for the reason I find from my personal view.

What do you dislike about Indition CRA?
I can mention 3 points which I like most in this system:
1. Facebook event activities and measuring actual insights
2. Fully customizable email formate and sent to right people for business growth or conversion
3. The automation process, like follow-up with the customer, for inbound and outbound calls

What problems is Indition CRA solving and how is that benefiting you?
I can mention 3 points which I like most in this system:
1. Facebook event activities and measuring actual insights
2. Fully customizable email formate and sent to right people for business growth or conversion
3. The automation process, like follow-up with the customer, for inbound and outbound calls
